full_text: *Pokes head in* Sees Twitter is still full of people being hateful and telling me I don’t exist or shouldn’t.  Shrugs and leaves *

Every time I log on to Twitter and try to be positive, try to hope for the future I am bombarded with bad news and the reminder that our ‘leaders’, powerful people,  and news organisations like the BBC are deeply transphobic.  At some point you just get too tired of it all.
